fields.name: Forum 1 Exchange Ideas for Community Web Development Projects
fields.description: Use this forum to connect with other members to discuss ideas for community website development projects.  If you have an idea that will benefit your community or society in general, then share it here and find other people to help you achieve your vision.

fields.name: What's Going on in the World?
fields.description: Use this forum to debate world events, and find out what others think

fields.name: Should the UK Really Leave the EU?
Please share your views on potential web applications that would benefit your community
What would make the world a better place?

fields.comment: Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.  Benjamin Franklin
